thobe.widgets.inputSlider

Class Slider<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JSlider
            • thobe.widgets.inputSlider.Slider<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleSlider, IntegerSlider

    public abstract class Slider<T>
extends javax.swing.JSlider
    Abstract class that represents a slider of an arbitrary type.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public abstract void setDefaultRange()

      • getDecreasedValue

        public abstract T getDecreasedValue()
        Returns the next value (>= min-range), computed by subtracting the tickSpacing from the current value.
        Returns:

      • setRange

        public abstract void setRange(T minimum,
            T maximum)
        Set the range of the slider. The tickspacing used will be calculated with the following equation: tickspacing = (maximum-minimum)/10
        Parameters:
        minimum - - lower bound of the sliders range
        maximum - - upper bound of the sliders range

      • setRange

        public void setRange(T minimum,
            T maximum,
            T tickSpacing)
        Set the range of the slider.
        Parameters:
        minimum - - lower bound of the sliders range
        maximum - - upper bound of the sliders range
        tickSpacing - - the spacing between the tick-marks

      • setEnableContinuousMode

        public void setEnableContinuousMode(boolean enable)
        Enable/ disable the continuous slider mode. Not enabled: values that does not match a value that is a multiple of tickspacing will be rounded to the nearest value that matches this restriction. Enabled: all values are allowed.
        Parameters:
        enable -

      • setFreezeSliderPos

        public void setFreezeSliderPos(boolean freeze)
        Draws a not fully opaque rectangle to visualize the last (freezed) position of the slider.
        Parameters:
        freeze - - true to enable the drawing of the freezed slider position, false to disable.
